```{r setup}
library(chromr)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

fl <- system.file(
   "extdata",
   "akta.asc",
   package = "chromr"
 )

df <- readr::read_tsv(fl, skip = 2) |> 
  janitor::clean_names()

df_fractions <- df |>
  dplyr::select(matches("fraction") - 1, matches("fraction")) |> 
    dplyr::rename(ml = 1) |> 
  drop_na()
data <- df |> 
  dplyr::select(
    -c(matches("fraction"), matches("fraction") - 1)
  ) |> 
  dplyr::rename(ml = 1)

data |> 
  # group_by(ml) |> 
  # drop_na() |> 
  mutate(
    m_au = m_au - 2050,
    frac = cut(ml, breaks = df_fractions$ml, labels = FALSE)
  ) |> 
  ggplot(aes(ml, m_au)) +
  geom_area(aes(fill = factor(frac %% 5), group = frac), na.rm = TRUE) + 
  geom_line() + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = 5) + 
  theme_bw() -> plt

plt

plotly::ggplotly(plt)
  
```
